ComicInfo.Summary:
The battle for Saur is on! Fauna's long-lost sister Flora is found, and proves to be a very useful friend while Ivory discovers her true friends.
Available with these lovely covers: Regular (and Nude), Sultry (and Nude) by Renato Camilo - Wraparound (and Nude) by Raulo Caceres -fully-painted Natural Beauty (and Nude) by Jonatas - Luscious (and Nude) by Matt Martin - Bikini Babes (and Nude) by Ron Adrian - set of six Sirens covers and three Adult covers by Christian Zanier - and a Century Nude by Camilo that is limited to just 100 copies!
